mapper.select: select name, no, major, phone, department, status, remark, password from manager
select name, no, major, phone, department, status, remark, password from manager where no=#{userName};
select ar.rid, title from member_role aur left join role ar on aur.rid = ar.rid where aur.mid = #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into manager(name, no, major, phone, department, status, remark, password) values (#{name},#{no},#{major},#{phone},#{department},#{status},#{remark},#{password})
insert into teacher(name, no, major, phone, department, password) values (#{name},#{no},#{major},#{phone},#{department},#{password})
